rooms.name: Entrance Hall / Vestibule

rooms.name: Living Area
rooms.description: An open-plan area combining living and dining spaces, featuring modern design elements and natural light. Vastu alignment ensures the seating area faces the north-east for prosperity.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: An integrated open-plan kitchen that flows seamlessly with the living area. Designed for contemporary cooking trends with energy-efficient appliances.

rooms.name: Library
rooms.description: A dedicated quiet space positioned in a corner to promote concentration and creativity. The placement follows Vastu guidelines for knowledge and intellectual growth.

rooms.name: Bathroom
rooms.description: A functional bathroom attached to the living area with water-saving fixtures. Designed following modern trends for cleanliness and efficiency.
